titles.title: Officer Sean Collier Campus Police Recognition Act of 2013
To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide death benefits for campus police officers.

bill.summary: 6/4/2013--Introduced. Officer Sean Collier Campus Police Recognition Act of 2013 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend public safety officers' death benefits to campus police officers. Defines a "campus police officer" as a police officer who is authorized to enforce the criminal laws and is employed by an institution of higher education.
